document_data.mainbody:
Volos Guide to Cormyr was a book written by Volothamp Geddarm. It was a travelogue about the kingdom of Cormyr. It was written over 1367 to 1368 DR.
Around 1372 DR, one copy was kept in the Tower of Tomes of the Leaves of Learning, a temple to Oghma in Deepingdale. Another copy was in the holdings at Candlekeep.
